taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a menu model opened in the editor.

step.cmd: In the editor view pane, select the menu item for which you want to define a keyboard shortcut.
In the properties view, put the focus on the field Keyboard shortcut.
Press simultaneously the desired modifiers (Ctrl, Alt, Shift) and the key. Note: you can press on the backspace key to clear the content of the field.

taskbody.result: The string representation of the keybaord shortcut is automatically displayed.
